sentences.en: ...the acquittal of six police officers charged with beating up a suspect.
sentences.cn: …对被控殴打一嫌疑犯的６名警官作出的无罪判决。

sentences.en: After his acquittal he leave the court smiling.
sentences.cn: 在宣判无罪后,他带着微笑离开法庭.

sentences.en: Lack of evidence resulted in their acquittal.
sentences.cn: 因证据不足而宣判他们无罪.

sentences.en: Law An annulment acquittal ; dismissal, of a court order.
sentences.cn: 取消, 宣告无罪; 法院命令的撤销.

sentences.en: Law An annulment or acquittal; dismissal, as of a court order.
sentences.cn: 撤消,宣告无罪; 法院命令的撤销.

sentences.en: The acquittal gave me hope to express my desire.
sentences.cn: 无罪的宣判给了我实现愿望的信心.

sentences.en: The case resulted in an acquittal.
sentences.cn: 此案件最终作出无罪判决。

sentences.en: The District Court denied petitioner � � s motion for a judgment of acquittal.
sentences.cn: 地区法院驳回上诉人提出的无罪判决的动议.

sentences.en: The jury brought in an acquittal.
The jury voted 8-to-4 in favor of acquittal.
sentences.cn: 陪审团以8比4的投票结果赞成无罪判决。

sentences.en: Your remarks in the court were necessary auxiliaries to my brother's acquittal.
sentences.cn: 你法庭上的陈词是宣判我哥哥无罪必不可少的辅助陈述.

words.tran_cn: 无罪释放；表现；脱卸义务和责任；清偿
赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿

trans.tran_cn: 宣告无罪，（义务、职责等的）履行，尽职，<古>（债务等的）清偿
trans.tran_en: an official statement in a court of law that someone is not guilty
